languages.text: "И как-то очень невовремя меня приметил новоприбывший комиссар. А я-то что? Одной рукой в кармане Астра Милитарум копаюсь, другой — Касбаллитские грузы раскладываю. Думаю, ты догадываешься, что стало бы с моей головушкой, не прицепись комиссар сначала к моим покровителям свыше". {n}Джай проводит пальцем поперек металлического горла и горько хмыкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И как-то очень невовремя меня приметил новоприбывший комиссар. А я-то что? Одной рукой в кармане Астра Милитарум копаюсь, другой — Ксбаллитские грузы раскладываю. Думаю, ты догадываешься, что стало бы с моей головушкой, не прицепись комиссар сначала к моим покровителям свыше". {n}Джай проводит пальцем поперек металлического горла и горько хмыкает.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived Commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the Commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И как-то очень невовремя меня приметил новоприбывший комиссар. А я-то что? Одной рукой в кармане Астра Милитарум копаюсь, другой — Касбаллитские грузы раскладываю. Думаю, ты догадываешься, что стало бы с моей головушкой, не прицепись комиссар сначала к моим покровителям свыше". {n}Джай проводит пальцем поперек металлического горла и горько хмыкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So did the newly arrived commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would happen to my head had the commissar not started with my patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and gives a bitter chuckle.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So did the newly arrived commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would happen to my head had the commissar not started with my patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and gives a bitter chuckle.{/n}

I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “就是那个时候，我引起了新任政委的注意。我一只手掏着星界军的口袋，另一只手运着卡斯巴利卡的货物。你可以想象，如果那个政委没有先去调查我上面的那些老主顾，我的脑袋会发生什么事情。”{n}婕伊用拇指划过她的金属喉咙，苦笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived Commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the Commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就是那个时候，我引起了新任政委的注意。我一只手掏着星界军的口袋，另一只手运着卡斯巴利卡的货物。你可以想象，如果那个政委没有先去调查我上面的那些老主顾，我的脑袋会发生什么事情。”{n}婕伊用拇指划过她的金属喉咙，苦笑起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

languages.text: «Y entonces fue cuando llamé la atención de un comisario recién llegado. Estaba rebuscando en los bolsillos del Astra Militarum con una mano y manejando el cargamento de la Kasballica con la otra. Puede imaginar dónde estaría mi cabeza si el comisario no hubiera empezado por mis patrones de alto rango». {n}Jae se pasa un pulgar por la garganta de metal y se ríe con amargura.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived Commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the Commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y entonces fue cuando llamé la atención de un comisario recién llegado. Estaba rebuscando en los bolsillos del Astra Militarum con una mano y manejando el cargamento de la Kasballica con la otra. Puede imaginar dónde estaría mi cabeza si el comisario no hubiera empezado por mis patrones de alto rango». {n}Jae se pasa un pulgar por la garganta de metal y se ríe con amargura.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「その時、あたしは新しくやってきたコミッサーの目に留まったの。あたしは片手で帝国防衛軍のポケットをあさって、もう片方の手でカスバリカンの貨物をかきあさっていたわ。もしコミッサーがあたしより階級が上のパトロンから始めなかったとしたら、あたしの頭がどうなっていたかは想像がつくでしょう」{n}ジェイは金属製の喉に親指を立て、苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived Commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the Commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その時、あたしは新しくやってきたコミッサーの目に留まったの。あたしは片手で帝国防衛軍のポケットをあさって、もう片方の手でカスバリカンの貨物をかきあさっていたわ。もしコミッサーがあたしより階級が上のパトロンから始めなかったとしたら、あたしの頭がどうなっていたかは想像がつくでしょう」{n}ジェイは金属製の喉に親指を立て、苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Und so habe ich die Aufmerksamkeit des frisch eingetroffenen Kommissars geweckt. Ich habe mit einer Hand die Taschen des Astra Militarum durchstöbert und mit der anderen Ware für die Kasballica verschoben. Ihr könnt Euch vorstellen, was mit meinem Kopf geschehen wäre, hätte der Kommissar nicht mit meinen höherstehenden Kunden begonnen." {n}Jae fährt sich mit dem Daumen über die metallische Kehle und lacht verbittert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived Commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the Commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und so habe ich die Aufmerksamkeit des frisch eingetroffenen Kommissars geweckt. Ich habe mit einer Hand die Taschen des Astra Militarum durchstöbert und mit der anderen Ware für die Kasballica verschoben. Ihr könnt Euch vorstellen, was mit meinem Kopf geschehen wäre, hätte der Kommissar nicht mit meinen höherstehenden Kunden begonnen." {n}Jae fährt sich mit dem Daumen über die metallische Kehle und lacht verbittert.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est là que j'ai attiré l'attention du commissaire nouvellement nommé. Je fouillais dans les poches de l'Astra Militarum d'une main tout en écoulant les marchandises de la Kasballica de l'autre. Je vous laisse imaginer ce qui se serait arrivé à ma tête si le commissaire n'avait pas commencé par mes clients de haut rang. » {n}Jae fais glisser son pouce sur sa gorge métallique et pousse un petit rire amer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived Commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the Commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est là que j'ai attiré l'attention du commissaire nouvellement nommé. Je fouillais dans les poches de l'Astra Militarum d'une main tout en écoulant les marchandises de la Kasballica de l'autre. Je vous laisse imaginer ce qui se serait arrivé à ma tête si le commissaire n'avait pas commencé par mes clients de haut rang. » {n}Jae fais glisser son pouce sur sa gorge métallique et pousse un petit rire amer.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu sırada yeni atanan Komiser'in dikkatini çektim. Bir elimle Astra Militarum'un ceplerini karıştırıyor, diğer elimle de Kasballica sevkiyatlarıyla oynuyordum. Komiser işe, üst düzey müşterilerimle başlamasaydı kelleme ne olacağını tahmin edebilirsin." {n}Jae, başparmağıyla metal boğazına bir çizgi çiziyor ve acı acı gülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And that's when I caught the attention of the newly arrived Commissar. I was rummaging through the pockets of Astra Militarum with one hand and shuffling the Kasballican cargo with the other. You can imagine what would've happened to my head had the Commissar not started with my higher-ranked patrons." {n}Jae draws a thumb across her metallic throat and chuckles bitterly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu sırada yeni atanan Komiser'in dikkatini çektim. Bir elimle Astra Militarum'un ceplerini karıştırıyor, diğeriyle de Kasballican sevkiyatlarını düzenliyordum. Komiser işe, üst düzey müşterilerimle başlamasaydı kelleme ne olacağını tahmin edebilirsin." {n}Jae, başparmağıyla metal boğazına bir çizgi çiziyor ve acı acı gülüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
